sourcesContent:
// Complete English UI Text Constants
// File: frontend/src/constants/englishUI.js

export const ENGLISH_UI = {
  // Navigation & Dashboard
  dashboard: 'Dashboard',
  studentDashboard: 'Student Dashboard',
  nurseDashboard: 'Nurse Dashboard',
  parentDashboard: 'Parent Dashboard',
  adminDashboard: 'Admin Dashboard',
  
  // Common Actions
  save: 'Save',
  cancel: 'Cancel',
  edit: 'Edit',
  delete: 'Delete',
  view: 'View',
  add: 'Add',
  create: 'Create',
  update: 'Update',
  search: 'Search',
  filter: 'Filter',
  export: 'Export',
  print: 'Print',
  submit: 'Submit',
  approve: 'Approve',
  reject: 'Reject',
  close: 'Close',
  
  // User Management
  userManagement: 'User Management',
  studentManagement: 'Student Management',
  students: 'Students',
  student: 'Student',
  studentCode: 'Student Code',
  studentName: 'Student Name',
  fullName: 'Full Name',
  firstName: 'First Name',
  lastName: 'Last Name',
  email: 'Email',
  phoneNumber: 'Phone Number',
  address: 'Address',
  dateOfBirth: 'Date of Birth',
  gender: 'Gender',
  male: 'Male',
  female: 'Female',
  grade: 'Grade',
  class: 'Class',
  
  // Health Management
  healthManagement: 'Student Health Management',
  healthRecord: 'Health Record',
  healthRecords: 'Health Records',
  healthProfile: 'Health Profile',
  healthDeclaration: 'Health Declaration',
  healthDeclarations: 'Health Declarations',
  healthCheckup: 'Health Checkup',
  healthCheckups: 'Health Checkups',
  medicalHistory: 'Medical History',
  medicalCondition: 'Medical Condition',
  allergies: 'Allergies',
  currentMedications: 'Current Medications',
  
  // Medication Management
  medicationManagement: 'Medication Management',
  medicationRequest: 'Medication Request',
  medicationRequests: 'Medication Requests',
  medicationName: 'Medication Name',
  dosage: 'Dosage',
  frequency: 'Frequency',
  startDate: 'Start Date',
  endDate: 'End Date',
  reason: 'Reason',
  notes: 'Notes',
  pending: 'Pending',
  approved: 'Approved',
  rejected: 'Rejected',
  administered: 'Administered',
  
  // Health Events & Checkups
  healthEvents: 'Health Events',
  createEvent: 'Create Event',
  eventName: 'Event Name',
  eventType: 'Event Type',
  eventDate: 'Event Date',
  scheduledDate: 'Scheduled Date',
  location: 'Location',
  description: 'Description',
  status: 'Status',
  planned: 'Planned',
  inProgress: 'In Progress',
  completed: 'Completed',
  cancelled: 'Cancelled',
  
  // Vaccination
  vaccination: 'Vaccination',
  vaccinations: 'Vaccinations',
  vaccinationRecord: 'Vaccination Record',
  vaccine: 'Vaccine',
  vaccines: 'Vaccines',
  vaccinationDate: 'Vaccination Date',
  nextDueDate: 'Next Due Date',
  
  // Forms & Documents
  form: 'Form',
  forms: 'Forms',
  document: 'Document',
  documents: 'Documents',
  healthDocumentation: 'Health Documentation',
  download: 'Download',
  upload: 'Upload',
  
  // Status Labels
  active: 'Active',
  inactive: 'Inactive',
  scheduled: 'Scheduled',
  emergency: 'Emergency',
  urgent: 'Urgent',
  normal: 'Normal',
  
  // Measurements
  height: 'Height',
  weight: 'Weight',
  temperature: 'Temperature',
  bloodPressure: 'Blood Pressure',
  heartRate: 'Heart Rate',
  
  // Emergency & Contact
  emergencyContact: 'Emergency Contact',
  emergencyContacts: 'Emergency Contacts',
  parentContact: 'Parent Contact',
  guardianContact: 'Guardian Contact',
  relationship: 'Relationship',
  
  // Time & Dates
  date: 'Date',
  time: 'Time',
  today: 'Today',
  yesterday: 'Yesterday',
  thisWeek: 'This Week',
  thisMonth: 'This Month',
  
  // Statistics
  total: 'Total',
  totalStudents: 'Total Students',
  pendingRequests: 'Pending Requests',
  completedToday: 'Completed Today',
  todayEvents: 'Today\'s Events',
  
  // Messages
  loading: 'Loading...',
  noData: 'No data available',
  noResults: 'No results found',
  error: 'Error',
  success: 'Success',
  warning: 'Warning',
  info: 'Information',
  confirmation: 'Confirmation',
  
  // Validation Messages
  required: 'This field is required',
  invalidEmail: 'Please enter a valid email address',
  invalidPhone: 'Please enter a valid phone number',
  invalidDate: 'Please enter a valid date',
  
  // Actions Confirmation
  deleteConfirmation: 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?',
  saveSuccess: 'Data saved successfully',
  updateSuccess: 'Data updated successfully',
  deleteSuccess: 'Data deleted successfully',
  saveError: 'Error saving data',
  updateError: 'Error updating data',
  deleteError: 'Error deleting data',
  
  // Specific Error Messages
  cannotLoadData: 'Cannot load dashboard data. Please try again.',
  processingRequest: 'Processing requests...',
  viewAndProcess: 'View and process medication requests from parents',
  
  // Role-specific Labels
  nurse: 'Nurse',
  doctor: 'Doctor',
  admin: 'Administrator',
  parent: 'Parent',
  
  // School Information
  schoolName: 'FPT Junior High School',
  healthOffice: 'Health Office',
  schoolAddress: '123 Education Street, Hanoi, Vietnam',
  schoolPhone: '(024) 123-4567',
  schoolEmail: 'health@fpt-junior.edu.vn',
  officeHours: 'Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM',
  nurseOnDuty: 'Nurse Sarah Williams, RN',
  
  // Document Types
  healthDeclarationForm: 'Health Declaration Form',
  vaccinationGuidelines: 'Vaccination Guidelines',
  emergencyProcedures: 'Emergency Procedures',
  schoolHealthPolicies: 'School Health Policies'
};

export default ENGLISH_UI;
